title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using the app.
welcome: Welcome to Investor! We value your privacy greatly and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how your information is collected, used, and protected when you use the app.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.subtitle: We may collect the following data:
items: Personal Information: Name, email, phone number, payment details.
Transaction Data: Purchases, point-back earnings, rewards history.
Device and Usage Data: IP address, in-app interactions, preferences.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.subtitle: We use your data to:
items: Improve user experience and app performance.
Send promotional offers and important updates.

section3.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
section3.subtitle: We do not sell or rent your personal data. However, we may share information with:
items: Service providers who help improve app performance.
Legal authorities when required by law.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement strict security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or misuse.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
items: You can access, modify, or delete your personal data.
You can unsubscribe from promotional messages at any time.

section6.title: 6. Policy Updates
section6.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Continued use of the app after updates means acceptance of the new terms.
